an4.139:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco dhammakathiko appanca bhasati asahitanca;
an4.139:1.4: parisa cassa na kusala hoti sahitasahitassa.
an4.139:1.5: Evarupo, bhikkhave, dhammakathiko evarupaya parisaya dhammakathikotveva sankham gacchati.
an4.139:2.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco dhammakathiko appanca bhasati sahitanca;
an4.139:2.3: Evarupo, bhikkhave, dhammakathiko evarupaya parisaya dhammakathikotveva sankham gacchati.
an4.139:3.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco dhammakathiko bahunca bhasati asahitanca;
an4.139:3.2: parisa cassa na kusala hoti sahitasahitassa.
an4.139:3.3: Evarupo, bhikkhave, dhammakathiko evarupaya parisaya dhammakathikotveva sankham gacchati.
an4.139:4.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco dhammakathiko bahunca bhasati sahitanca;
an4.139:4.3: Evarupo, bhikkhave, dhammakathiko evarupaya parisaya dhammakathikotveva sankham gacchati.
